alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 5:44AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cherokee, Crawford, western Barton, northwestern Newton and western Jasper Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 543 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Parsons to near Chetopa to near Afton. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Joplin... Pittsburg... Carthage... Webb City... Prairie State Park... Carl Junction... Baxter Springs... Frontenac... Columbus... Galena... Girard... Oronogo... Seneca... Carterville... Duquesne... Arma... Duenweg... Diamond... Liberal... Loma Linda... This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 0 and 17. Interstate 49 between mile markers 27 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
